thread.title: Watch Sarah Silverman and Stephen Colbert read hilariously bad kids' jokes - Fun
thread.title_full: Watch Sarah Silverman and Stephen Colbert read hilariously bad kids' jokes - Fun News - Digital Spy

author: Harry Fletcher
title: Watch Sarah Silverman and Stephen Colbert read hilariously bad kids' jokes - Fun
text: Sarah Silverman and Stephen Colbert are among the best joke tellers in the US, and they've now challenged themselves by turning their hand to jokes written by children.The pair deliver gags contributed by kids in the video below, and the results are hilariously bad.Tom Hanks teams up with Stephen Colbert to answer life's big questionsWatch Stephen Colbert mock Donald Trump relentlessly... to his face Colbert reads out gags from the Bad Kids Jokes tumblr account, including: "What do you call a middle-aged, sad, grey hair woman? A teacher."Silverman closes the brilliant section by saying: "What did the egg say to the other egg? Have an eggselent day."Elsewhere, it was recently announced that Silverman will star alongside Breaking Bad's Dean Norris and Pushing Daisies actor Lee Pace in The Book of Henry.
